DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the feasibility of EUS-FNA for patients taking anticoagulants without heparin bridge.
DOC.brief_title: EUS-FNA for Patients Taking Anticoagulants Without Heparin Bridge
DOC.criteria: Taking anticoagulants Written informed consent Platelets count less than 50000/Î¼l PTINR more than 2.6 ASA more than 3 Severe bleeding tendency
